## ObservabilityTools.ConsoleUserLogger class

Console-based user logger that extends diagnostic logging with success method.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ConsoleUserLogger extends Logging.LoggerBase implements IUserLogger 
```
**Extends:** Logging.LoggerBase

**Implements:** [IUserLogger](./ts-res-ui-components.observabilitytools.iuserlogger.md)
